description:
Safeguard your space from crawling pests

The Crawling Pest Protection Kit offers full outdoor and indoor protection against crawling pests like ticks, ants, and other insects.

This kit provides a triple-action approach to pest management. Ant Adios uses biologically derived spinosad to eliminate ant mounds and colonies without harming your lawn. Nix Ticks kills and repels ticks, fleas, and mosquitoes, offering extended protection. Bug Doom Outdoor creates a protective zone around your home, keeping pests at bay for up to 4 weeks. Together, these products offer peace of mind and a pest-free environment for the whole family.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that care for your home and the world around it.

sections.kit_benefits:
Comprehensive home and yard pest control kit
Kills dozens of pests including ants, spiders, cockroaches, and more
Repels and prevents pests for up to 4 weeks
Eliminates ant mounds and colonies effectively
Kills ticks on contact and repels for weeks
Scientifically formulated with essential oils, pyrethrin, and spinosad
Made for any yard and home
Formulated without harsh chemicals
Easy to use and apply safely
sections.whats_included:
1 Ant Adios Insect & Ant Killer: Granular spinosad bait to control ants and other insects. Covers up to 4,000 sq. ft.
1 Bug Doom Outdoor Insect Control Spray: Chrysanthemum extract and canola oil-based spray to control outdoor perimeter pests. Covers up to 1,500 sq. ft.
1 Nix Ticks Bug Control Spray: Cedar oil-based spray for tick, flea, and mosquito control. Covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply when pests are active and dry outdoors. Start treatments in early spring and continue through fall to prevent and control pest populations. In warmer climates, use year-round as needed.
Apply Bug Doom Outdoor: Shake well before use. Spray 1 foot up and 1 foot out from your home's foundation to create a protective barrier, and spot treat any known infestation areas as needed. Reapply every 2–4 weeks to maintain a strong barrier.
Apply Nix Ticks: Apply according to the labeled instructions. For initial treatment, reapply after 7 days. Reapply every 4 weeks or as needed for ongoing protection.
Apply Ant Adios: Apply as a mound, barrier, or lawn application according to the labeled rates. Reapply every 2–4 weeks or after heavy rain. If the bait gets wet, reapply once the area dries.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What insects are controlled by each product?
Ant Adios: Controls common ants, earwigs, cutworms, sowbugs, pillbugs, and crickets. Eliminates ant mounds and their colonies.
Bug Doom Outdoor: Effective against ants, spiders, beetles, cockroaches, bed bugs, and more. Check the label for detailed pest information.
Nix Ticks: Kills ticks, mosquitoes, and fleas on contact, and repels for up to 4 weeks.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes! This kit is designed to work with other Sunday products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid applications, and avoid getting baits wet for best results.
Is there a risk of staining?
Bug Doom contains canola oil, which has a slight risk of staining. We recommend testing in an inconspicuous area (especially on porous surfaces) before treating a larger area.
When will I see results?
Expect immediate impact from Bug Doom Outdoor and Nix Ticks, with lasting protection up to 4 weeks when used as directed. Ant Adios shows results within 2–4 weeks as the bait is consumed.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Always read pest control labels for best results and safety for you and the environment.
Any state restrictions?
This product is approved for use in all states.
Always read pest control labels for best results and safety for you and the environment.
